title: Local Hour: Miami Heat Basketball!
description:
It's a Spiced Up Wednesday, and the Shipping Container is bringing the energy! The crew discusses opening night of the NBA before previewing the 2022-23 Miami Heat season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
